id.comment: Select all print statement that Uses something

query.querystr: variable v; print r; Select r such that Uses(r, v)

id.comment: Select specific print statement that Uses something

query.querystr: variable v; print r; Select r such that Uses(3, r)

id.comment: Select specific assignment statement that Uses an ident

query.querystr: variable v1, v; assign r; Select r such that Uses(r, "b")

id.comment: Select variables being Used in a specific assignment statement

query.querystr: variable v1, v; assign r; Select v1 such that Uses(7, v1)

id.comment: Select variables being Used in a in all while loops

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select v such that Uses(w, v)

id.comment: Select variable being Used in a specific if

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select v such that Uses(6, v)

id.comment: Select all reads if there is a assignment statement in a while

query.querystr: read r; while w; assign a; Select r such that Parent(w, a)

id.comment: Select all statements if line 7 is a descendent of line 4

query.querystr: read r; while w; assign a; Select r such that Parent*(4, 7)

id.comment: Select all statements if line 7 is a child of line 4 (meaningless query)

query.querystr: read r; while w; assign a; Select r such that Parent(4, 7)
Select s such that Parent*(4, s) 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13
